short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks F1TV images to prevent spoilers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
F1TV Spoiler Shield: Protect your Formula 1 viewing experience by blocking potentially spoiler-filled images on F1TV.

This extension allows you to browse F1TV without the risk of seeing race results before you're ready. Easily toggle image blocking on and off, ensuring you can enjoy F1 content at your own pace. Perfect for fans who can't watch races live but want to preserve the excitement of unseen events.
